TopicTitle: How to turn fastest with the BIG wheels (I think)

Articles.Content:
So I have the massive, 80 ton rover using the big wheels, and when I was playing another game, I neutral-steered. I realized, HEY! That'll probly work.

So, don't turn while you're moving, but slow down all the way, then turn left or right. These wheels use the same mechanism as a tank, which means it turns fastest when stopped. This is because when stopped,

1 Side forward, 1 side backward. When moving, 

One side slower/stopped, 1 side still going forward, if you're moving forward, backwards if going backwards.

It still turns slow, though

In a similar vein, while holding W and spam-tapping A and S, you can go really fast with the big wheels. It eats a lot of electricity though.
